name: isu2
description: An improved version of my ISU project

scripts.build:watch: rimraf out.js && watchify *.js --ignore-watch out.js -o out.js -v --transform [ babelify --presets [ env ] ]
scripts.build: rimraf out.js && browserify index.js -o out.js --transform [ babelify --presets [ env ] ]
scripts.build:prod: rimraf out.js && browserify index.js -o out.js --transform [ babelify --presets [ env minify ] ]

author: thatlittlegit
